name: armstrong-rewrite
description: Initial stating project for the 2021 Armstrong rewrite.

scripts.postinstall: (cd module && npm i) && (cd playground && npm i) && npm run link-armstrong-rewrite
scripts.link-armstrong-rewrite: (cd module && npm run build && npm run link) && (cd playground && npm run link-armstrong-rewrite)
scripts.upgrade-all: ncu -u && (cd module && ncu -u) && (cd playground && ncu -u) && npm i

author: developers@rocketmakers.com
